com.trackplus.dao

Interface AccountDAO


  • public interface AccountDAO
    This class implements the data access object (DAO) for work and cost accounts. Accounts belong to cost centers, and can be assigned to projects. Actual work and cost is written towards accounts.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void delete(java.lang.Integer objectID)
      Deletes an account from the database
      boolean hasDependentData(java.lang.Integer objectID)
      Returns whether the account has dependent data

      Gets all accounts

      Loads a list of Taccount by costcenters

      Loads a list of Taccount by objectID list

      Loads accounts by costcenter and label

      Loads an Taccount by objectID.

      Loads the accounts with a specific stateflag which are present in a project

      Loads the accounts with a specific stateflag
      java.util.List<Taccount> loadByWorkItemKeys(int[] workItemKeys)
      Loads the Taccount list by workItemKeys (issue numbers).
      void replaceAndDelete(java.lang.Integer oldID, java.lang.Integer newID)
      Replaces all occurrences of the oldID with the newID and then deletes the oldID account
      java.lang.Integer save(Taccount accountBean)
      Saves an account to the Taccount table.
